about_the_game:
Roshpit Champions is back with a totally reimagined sequel to the massive Dota 2 mod!

Embark on a quest where every hero has their own legacy to shape. With an expansive hero system, delve into a detailed world and craft a character build that's uniquely yours.



30 Diverse Classes: From an archer of the stars to a relentless demon terrorizing the skies, Roshpit Champions 2 offers a range of classes that cater to every play style. Whether you like to stand at the forefront of battles, strategize from afar, or support your allies with heals and buffs, there's a class tailored just for you.

Special Abilities for Each Hero: Dive into a completely unique skill set for every hero, all enhanced by a standardized 4x4 passive tree grid. With this system, gear can universally influence every class, minimizing the need for class-specific equipment. Craft and customize to ensure your hero stands apart from the rest.

Boundless Skillsets: Why limit the fun? In Roshpit Champions 2, heroes can reach across class lines to use new skills. Borrow, mix, and match to create a hero that's uniquely yours.

Swift Leveling Experience: With minimal grind, it's never been easier to explore and level up multiple heroes. RPC2 ensures that leveling up is a rewarding journey without feeling like a job. Whether you're focused on mastering one hero or exploring the depths of multiple alts, the road to greatness is swift with minimal padding.


Game World

Venture into an enchanting realm filled with hidden secrets and brutal adversaries.

18 Unique Environments: Step into a carefully designed tapestry of worlds. From mystical forests to fiery volcanoes, the diversity of landscapes will captivate your imagination.

Freedom to Explore: Invisible walls have been banished! Players are encouraged to wander, climb, and discover to their heart's content. Worlds are designed with full mobility in mind, giving you the option to skip past a troublesome boss or rush through to the next zone.

Hidden Treasures & Challenges: Delve deep into hidden caves, swim across lakes and ponds, and confront hidden bosses. Each secret you uncover could be the key to rare and valuable loot.

Aggressive Enemies: Battle against 100s of distinct monster types with unique skillsets. Beware of the elite enemies enhanced with a random selection of 14 elemental affixes!


Equipment and Loot

Power up and redefine what's possible with each piece of equipment that you claim.

Diverse Power Affixes: Elevate your hero in multiple dimensions. Whether you're embracing a straightforward stat boost or reveling in newfound mobility, each affix is specially designed to provide substantial and intriguing enhancements.

Valuable at Every Turn: No more sifting through endless junk. RPC2's loot system ensures that the majority of items you discover have inherent value, either through strategic upgrades or the coveted presence of rare affixes.

Skill-Granting Gear: Beyond the passive bonuses, some pieces of equipment bless you with entirely new skills, reshaping the way you engage with the world and confront challenges.

Minimal Filler: Every affix is crafted to be compelling and impactful. Say goodbye to those mundane affixes that dampen the thrill of a good gear roll.

Universal Gear Appeal: RPC2's world and economy thrive on versatility. Most of the loot is free from strict class requirements, allowing a broader spectrum of heroes to harness their potential.

The Chase for the Ultra-Rare: While the road to becoming the ultimate champion doesn't demand the most elusive of items, the allure of the ultra-rare keeps the flame of the hunt alive. These treasures, while not essential, are always waiting to be found, ensuring that the thirst for the next great find never wanes, even deep into the late game.


Online Multiplayer

Join other players in an online co-op adventure, and engage with a dynamic economy.

In-Game Auction House: Found an item that doesn't resonate with your build? The in-game auction house ensures that what doesn't fit your arsenal might be a build-defining for another. Sell, earn, and reinvest to find that perfect piece for your collection.

Pickup-Group Friendly: The online multiplayer is designed in a way that encourages co-operative play, barring the most obnoxious of trolls.

Vibrant Trade Environment: RPC2 thrives on diversity and experimentation. With gear effects and benefits that defy easy categorization, players are encouraged to explore a myriad of builds. This rich variety nurtures a bustling trade scene, where every item holds potential. There are absolutely no trade restrictions!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: i5-6500 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300U or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 5600 or equivalent
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Roshpit Champions 2 is a distinctive Online Action RPG. Players explore hand-crafted maps filled with omnifarious monsters, powerful bosses, and legendary equipment. Design a personalized combat style and carve out your own unique builds - in hopes of overcoming the will of an Ancient God.
